note: I write books about media, technology, and society. (Team Human, Survival of the Richest, Present Shock, Throwing Rocks at the Google Bus). Made some PBSFrontline docs (Merchants of Cool, Generation Like), graphic novels (Aleister & Adolf, Testament, ADD), and the Team Human podcast. I'm a Prof of media theory and digital economics at CUNY/Queens, and playing with people at IFTF, The Story Giants, Sugar23, EoI, and here in Hastings on Hudson.
